reporter_caption.center: PARKS v. LIBERTY MUTUAL INS. CO., 292 So.2d 240 (La. 1974)

caption.center: CLARENCE A. PARKS ET UX. v. LIBERTY MUTUAL INS. CO., ET AL.

opinion.posture: IN RE: CLARENCE A. PARKS, ET UX. APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI OR WRIT OF REVIEW TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, SECOND CIRCUIT, PARISH OF CADDO.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ denied. The result is correct.
